programme.title: 50th anniversary of D Day, 1994
programme.short_synopsis: The 50th anniversary of D Day, and the Polish contribution in Normandy.
programme.medium_synopsis: The Polish contribution to the Normandy landings are examined by Cooke following the 50th D Day commemorations, including why recent allied operations have been less successful.

display_title.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
display_title.subtitle: 50th anniversary of D Day, 1994

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
